TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON GPE , is a NORP national , who was born on DATE in the city of FAC , GPE , and currently resides in GPE , the LOC . The respondent Government are represented by PERSON , ORG GPE before the ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

From DATE until DATE the applicant worked as the head of the technical department of the Perekopkhimstroy company ( hereafter “ the company ” ) . He was also allegedly required to perform the functions of a building engineer .

In DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in ORG against the company , seeking the recovery of the building engineer ’s salary that was allegedly due to him . On DATE ORG ordered the commencement of proceedings . A hearing was held on DATE . On DATE ORG ordered the seizure of documents relating to the salary paid to the applicant by the company . By a judgment on DATE , ORG partly allowed the applicant ’s claims , and ordered the company to pay the applicant CARDINAL karbovantsi ( hereafter “ krb ” ; CARDINAL ukrayinski hryvni - the present currency - hereafter “ ORG ” ) .
On DATE ORG of the GPE quashed this decision and remitted the case for further consideration .

On DATE ORG ordered an economic - accounting expertise ( бухгалтерсько-економічна експертиза ) in the case . By a judgment of DATE , ORG partly allowed the applicant ’s claims and ordered the company to pay the applicant the sum of CARDINAL krb . On DATE the applicant was paid ORG CARDINAL in execution of the decision .

On DATE the President of ORG lodged a protest against the decision of DATE , seeking its annulment . On DATE ORG of the LOC allowed the protest of the President of ORG and remitted the case for further consideration to ORG .

In DATE the applicant lodged complaints with the President of ORG against the decision of DATE , seeking to initiate supervisory review proceedings ( перегляд рішення в порядку нагляду ) . On DATE the Deputy President of ORG , by letter , rejected his claims as unsubstantiated .
On DATE ORG rejected the applicant ’s claims for the recovery of salary and compensation .
On DATE the applicant lodged a cassation appeal with ORG , seeking to quash the judgment of ORG of DATE .
On DATE the applicant informed the President of ORG that he had no intention of lodging the cassation appeal through the first instance court .

On DATE ORG suspended the referral of the cassation appeal to ORG on the ground that it had not been lodged in compliance with LAW . In particular , the applicant had not supplied enough copies of the cassation appeal and had failed to pay the ORG tax . The applicant was allowed DATE ( until DATE ) to rectify the mistakes . He was also informed that , unless he rectified them , his cassation appeal would be returned to him without consideration .
On DATE ORG refused the applicant leave to lodge a cassation appeal against its judgment of DATE due to the applicant ’s failure to comply with its ruling of DATE .

The applicant complained about the ORG decision of DATE to the President of ORG , seeking to initiate supervisory proceedings . The complaint was rejected by the President of ORG DATE as being unsubstantiated .

In DATE the applicant lodged his complaint with the President of ORG of GPE against the decision of ORG of DATE , seeking its annulment . He also complained that he was not provided with a copy of the protest itself or a copy of the ensuing decision . On CARDINAL DATE ORG of GPE refused to initiate supervisory review proceedings ( перегляд рішення в порядку нагляду ) since the impugned decision was not appended to the complaints . It also recommended that the applicant address ORG of ORG of GPE in the LOC with a view to receiving a copy of the decision of DATE by ORG .
On DATE ORG of ORG of GPE in the LOC rejected the applicant ’s request for a copy of the decision , as he should have applied directly to the court which had given it .

In DATE the applicant lodged a complaint with the President of ORG of the LOC requesting the initiation of supervisory review proceedings against the decision of DATE of ORG . On DATE ORG informed the applicant of the need to rectify mistakes in his complaint ( the need to pay the ORG tax for the introduction of the complaint , and the need to provide copies of the relevant judicial decisions ) . The applicant complained to the President of ORG response . On DATE the President of ORG rejected the applicant ’s complaints as being unsubstantiated and refused to initiate supervisory review proceedings in the case ( перегляд рішення в порядку нагляду ) .
